title: Ucy
author: Ucy
content: It doesn't matter what stage of development the Child in the womb is just as it doesn't matter if a 2 year old or adult Human should be considered more human or a living being. It's even more important to protect the human in its vulnerable and weak stage of life, and the worst is killing it deliberately at the stage it can't defend itself.The unborn children are innocent living humans who do not deserve to be killed no matter what. The CREATOR is highly displeased with those who murder the innocent.When faced with the challenge of whether to save the Mother or the child first, for whatever reason, the answer should be to first save the one who needs it most. Do not sacrifice one for the other unless with their consent. Let's put an end to Child Sacrifice aka Abortion

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: At first I was tempted not to answer to such obvious false statements but seeing how they spread around the world and leading to more strict laws I simply can't ignore it. If you would have gone to school you would have had some kind of teaching how a child is developed. A child is not from day one a final human that just sits there 9 month and just waits to come out of the women. It is for example at day one a sperm that would be as goos/bad to abort like it is good/bad to masturbate. So while it is bad to abort in the last weeks/month of pregnancy it is not the same as abortion at the beginning of pregnancy.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: hZti on June 28, 2022, 05:23:48 PMAt first I was tempted not to answer to such obvious false statements but seeing how they spread around the world and leading to more strict laws I simply can't ignore it. If you would have gone to school you would have had some kind of teaching how a child is developed. A child is not from day one a final human that just sits there 9 month and just waits to come out of the women. It is for example at day one a sperm that would be as goos/bad to abort like it is good/bad to masturbate. So while it is bad to abort in the last weeks/month of pregnancy it is not the same as abortion at the beginning of pregnancy.If it were false, it wouldn't be spreading in USA or around the World... That is GOD's power in action in this period of awakening of mankind. It's spreading because people are being given the last chance by our CREATOR to change their evil practices.Â I Pray HE will be merciful & give you too the last chance to apologize to HIM. You don't need to apologize to me.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: A child in the womb and/or any stage after conception, is simply a stage in the life or a human being. If we start accepting abortion as the norm, we will open up euthanizing to any stage in the life of people. It will become a war of the government against the governed.However, God will straighten things our for His people.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on June 29, 2022, 04:11:42 PMA child in the womb and/or any stage after conception, is simply a stage in the life or a human being. If we start accepting abortion as the norm, we will open up euthanizing to any stage in the life of people. It will become a war of the government against the governed.However, God will straighten things our for His people.GOD Bless, brother in CHRIST.

comments.author: 81coin
comments.body: Omg, seems like God is talking to you

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: 81coin on July 14, 2022, 11:23:36 PMOmg, seems like God is talking to you God is talking to... everybody who reads the Bible, or hears it being read on Bible tapes or CDs.

comments.author: sbrys
comments.body: So an innocent girl that is raped has to be forced to keep the child ?Girls gets more traumatized and child is a product of a crime that starts with very limited chances in lifeâ€¦Sounds brilliant

comments.author: Ucy
comments.created_time: July 16, 2022, 04:51:05 PMLast edit: July 16, 2022, 11:17:13 PM by Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: sbrys on July 16, 2022, 10:57:56 AMSo an innocent girl that is raped has to be forced to keep the child ?Girls gets more traumatized and child is a product of a crime that starts with very limited chances in lifeâ€¦Sounds brilliant Â I addressed that already here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404784.msg60485601#msg60485601If you consider the child a product of crime then any child who is concieved in sin (which is crime to our CREATOR) is guilty & does not deserve to live. To be honest, most humans are guilty of unholy conception and do not deserve to live but our CREATOR still values us so much to keep us alive.The one who killed a child concieved in sin and the rapist actually did evil. There should be other ways around that. Problems should be solved without creating more problems otherwise nothing is solved. Killing the child is a big problem that actually can traumatize anyone with conscience.
